DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study assess impact measurement base treatment program ( MBT ) Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) remission rate patient whose primary care provider ( PCP ) receive monthly patient-reported depression severity report compare patient whose PCP receive monthly report .
DOC.criteria: Age â‰¥18 year old Diagnosis major depressive disorder Prescribed new prescription antidepressant medication date study enrollment currently take medication 'New ' define antidepressant use previous 120 day Primary depression management perform primary care provider Capable selfmanagement ( i.e. , take medication independently respond followup contact ) Able provide inform consent participate Sufficient ability judge physician read , understand complete survey instrument write English phone interview speak English History psychotic disorder bipolar disorder Diagnosis current postpartum depression Diagnosis bereavement le 8 week duration Currently pregnant History suicide attempt current suicide plan Need psychiatric hospitalization enrollment visit History adjunctive treatment include electroconvulsive treatment ( ECT ) , vagus nerve stimulation ( VNS ) , transcranial magnetic stimulation ( TMS ) , magnetic seizure therapy ( MST ) , deep brain stimulation ( DBS )
